scripts.prebuild: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path='.next/server/app/(app)'; try { fs.mkdirSync(path, {recursive:true}); } catch(e) {}" || true
scripts.postbuild: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path='.next/server/app/(app)/page_client-reference-manifest.js'; try { if(!fs.existsSync(path)) { fs.writeFileSync(path, '{}'); } } catch(e) {}" || true
